member.name: P:CloudPad.Internal.LoaderLock.ApplicationBase
member.summary: This value is always null when running from within LINQPad. When running outside LINQPad the value is only valid for the duration of the LINQPad UserQuery constructor.

member.name: T:CloudPad.Util
member.summary: Late bound subset of LINQPad.Util interface. These utilities short circuit gracefully (do nothing) when not running within a LINQPad context.

member.name: T:CloudPad.Extensions
member.summary: Late bound subset of LINQPad.Extensions interface. These utilities short circuit gracefully (do nothing) when not running within a LINQPad context.

member.name: M:CloudPad.CloudStorageHelper.AddQueueMessageAsync(System.String,System.Object,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Put a storage queue message in the queue specified by queueName. The queue message will be serialized as JSON. If you pass a CloudQueueMessage instance, the message is added to the queue as-is (not serialized as JSON).

member.name: P:CloudPad.HttpTriggerAttribute.Route
member.summary: Gets or sets the route template for the function. Can include route parameters using WebApi supported syntax. If not specified, will default to the function name.

member.name: P:CloudPad.HttpTriggerAttribute.Methods
member.summary: Gets the http methods that are supported for the function.

member.name: P:CloudPad.HttpTriggerAttribute.AuthLevel
member.summary: Gets the authorization level for the function.
